response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is an unparalleled chance to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
